items.title: U.S. core inflation rises 2.9 pct in July
items.summary: NEW YORK, Aug. 29 (Xinhua) -- U.S. core inflation, measured by the core personal consumption expenditures (PCE) price index excluding food and energy, rose 2.9 percent year-over-year in July, the highest level since February, the Bureau of Economic Analysis (BEA) reported Friday. Read full story

items.summary:
ORICO USB 4 40Gb/s M.2 NVMe SSD Enclosure

Buy for $42 (Reg. $70)

Apply code ORICOACOM2 during checkout.

What we love

Sure, we see SSD enclosures go on sale for less, but not when they support 40Gb/s transfer speeds. This typically drives the cost up to $70 for this sort of thing and well over $50 when they go on sale. Today’s markdown goes well under that at $42. Doing the math, this means you can theoretically transfer a 5GB file in just one second if you have all of your ducks in a row.

more…

items.title: You don’t want to be that guy, keep nose and ear hair at bay with MANSCAPED’s Weed Whacker 2.0 at $32
items.summary:
MANSCAPED Weed Whacker 2.0 Nose & Ear Hair Trimmer

Buy for $32 (Reg. $40)

Clip the on-page 20% off coupon.

What we love

I don’t love it, but trimming unsightly hair really needs to be done. I picked up this trimmer and can tell you first hand that it does the job well. I also love that it has USB-C onboard for a straightforward charging experience when  at home and on the go.
